mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.customer ("customerPassword", email, "phoneNumber", "customerName", address, birthday) VALUES (#{customerPassword},#{email},#{phoneNumber},#{customerName},#{address},#{birthday})
mapper.select: SELECT count(email) FROM customer where email = #{email} and "customerPassword" = #{pwd}
SELECT "customerId" FROM customer where email = #{email} and "customerPassword" = #{pwd}
SELECT email FROM public.customer where "customerName" = #{name} and "phoneNumber" = #{phone}
SELECT "customerPassword" FROM public.customer where email=#{email} and "customerName"=#{name}
